website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, durable fountain that will easily become the focal point of your yard or garden.
pros: Sports a rustic, stone-like look complete with 2 tiers and climbing turtles
Holds up to 2.5 gallons of water
Construction is durable and the base is stable
cons: The fountain will stop working if not completely in the sun, and may take several sunny to gain power
Some longevity issues of the pump noted

customer_reviews.title: Staple in my garden
customer_reviews.text: This actually works!!!! After many failed attempts at using solar powered bird baths/fountains, I finally found one that works. What I like best about it is that it has the ability to charge enough to run after the sun goes down. Hearing the trickling of water at 10pm while enjoying the night sky is pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Octavius Smiley-Humphries

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fountain, solar on demand feature and the color!! It looked like it was black when I opened the box and when I took it out there is a dark verdis green color marbled effect throughout. It is BEAUTIFUL!! The small birds can be safe because it has a shallow bowl. This is a heavy fountain and well worth the money! It comes in 3 pieces so it can be easily taken apart and moved around. I"m thinking about getting one for the backyard also.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H.

customer_reviews.title: Even the birds don't like it. I have other solar bird baths on ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived cracked, but usable. Seller did not respond to my email to replace cracked parts, but it worked anyway. I have had this outside since April., only 2 1/2 months. It has started to disintegrate. I just went to change the water, as it had turned green and now I see that the entire second tier is disintegrating. The plaster is pooled at the bottom. Even the birds don't like it. I have other solar bird baths on by back deck, they love the others, but the birds don't seem to like this one at all. My recommendation is to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: luvtobuy

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, easy to assemble, incredibly efficient
customer_reviews.text: This works so well in my garden I am very pleased with it's quality for the price. I feel like I got away with murder finding this one. Most fountains are overpriced, poor quality and frustrating to put together. This was not the case, everything went smooth and the maintenance is so minimal. I even put glow stones in mine and it still work like a dream. 10/10 would buy over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Wispy Warrior

customer_reviews.title: It is nicely made and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a birthday present. It is nicely made and pretty, but it doesn't work. I have contacted Amazon warranty, and the manufacturer multiple times with no response. For some reason, a return wasn't offered by Amazon. Multiple emails and voicemails were never responded to by the manufacturer/store. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: still looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, due to life, we did not open this fountain when we received it. A month later, we set it up and followed instructions to charge the pump. The pump never worked correctly. Amazon return window was closed, or we would have returned. Contacted manufacturer and had to leave a message. Have not received a call back (three weeks later). My husband bought a new pump that requires electricity, so we have a fountain, but not the look we were going for of course. As to the peeling I have now read reviews about, we have not experienced that 3 months in. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: The first couple of years worked great even in partial shade
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of years worked great even in partial shade, clouds, and rain. It stays indoors in freezing part of winter. If you want it for just 2 years, it's perfect. After 2 years the composite degrades a lot. The top bowl broke from the base, and either the pump, solar, or battery stopped working at all. I don't mind replacing all of that with a new pump kit that costs nearly as much as the fountain, but kind of disappointed that the whole structure is disintegrating.
customer_reviews.author: Idk

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this looks. It took some time to get it set up properly and level but, once that is done, it is a very nice looking addition to our garden that works well, the water sounds nice, and the birds seem to really like it too. One thing, you have to make sure that it has enough water to not wear out the pump by running dry. That's easy enough to do with a watering can once in a while. The only real problem seems to be - neighbor envy!! So many people have told us that they think it's really nice that I worry about thieves in the night,,,,just kidding, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Missus  B

customer_reviews.title: issues? NONE!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why some reviewers said this unit had issues with the pump, solar cells or water flow. I have run this thing constantly since I got it and there are zero issues. If you want it to run well CLEAN the pump intake! I clean out the basin and pump intake about every two days. I would have no problem recommending this bird bath. Its solidly built, looks nice and operates as advertised. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: robert grudberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, solid but stopped working after a month or so
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, worked as promised, although I haven't had it on long so don't know how long it will operate. I like the on/off feature. Only real disappointment was that there were (2) chucks of the resin chipped off. Too much of a hassle to repackage and return, as I can hide the damage a bit with a marker. why is there no button for seller feedback? No way to contact them. I was hoping for a discounted price due to damage. Updated review. This stopped working after a few weeks. Very disappointed. No customer service to help. $150 hunk of concrete in backyard. At least I can still use as birdbath but no flowing water.
customer_reviews.author: Navy gal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working-No Replacement Parts
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I have only had the unit for a year, and it died. It was in full sun all day long. Worked great, then died. Tried all troubleshooting instructions, then went online. Cannot order batteries anymore, nor can you order the pump. Too bad, because I bought one for my brother, and two friends purchased as well. I'm now embarrassed for recommending this fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. White

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing sounds, but now leaking
customer_reviews.text: Nice peaceful sound. Easy to carry, 60 yo women able to cary down stairs, it comes in 3 parts. Set up and it started working right away. Update 4/27 :solar pump stopped working...it is in direct sunlight, update 4/29: i put an electric pump in it, now it is leaking from some where, have to add water twice a day...ugg! It so big it would be hard to ship back
customer_reviews.author: L.. Marum

customer_reviews.title: You need to turn off the solar panel for a while and use it only when you want.
customer_reviews.text: It was nice when the solar panel worked. I left the solar panel off for three days getting sun all day, first time I turned on was working even at night, after that day no anymore. If you take a look at the picts, you will see there is no more shower option because the solar panel is not charging as new. I tried to contact the seller to see if I can at least exchange the solar panel but there was not way. It was asking to return it completely and I didn't want it to send the while thing back.
customer_reviews.author: Jcmak

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound of trickling water
customer_reviews.text: The birds are happy with their new bath and my neighbors all love the fountain too. Place it in full sun to maximize the solar potential. Update May 2020: Sadly, the fountain suddenly quit working after several months, still shy of the 1-year warranty. I have flushed the pump and made sure the impeller is clear. All connections appear to dry and tight. I don't know if it's the pump or the solar panel that is broken. I will be contacting SmartLiving to see about replacement parts (~$65 for pump and solar panel) or full replacement of the fountain.
customer_reviews.author: CoralCin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but only functioned for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I actually LOVE the look of the fountain. The problem is with the solar fountain. It worked for 3 months and then stopped. I tried to see what was going on with it and when I went to check it out, it started up again! There are loose wires in the fountain somewhere because it starts up every once in a while. I live in SW Florida, so it definitely isn't lack of sun!
customer_reviews.author: kellandhow

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but damaged
customer_reviews.text: The standard "made in China" shipping box was crushed and falling apart on arrival. There was a 3 inch chunk out of the base corner where the box was smashed in, 3 places in the top missing paint, and a full corner of the base that would be under the fountain top was missing. At 44 pounds I was afraid the same thing would happen with a replacement, and the price had gone up considerably since I'd bought it, so I contacted Amazon and was given a discount to keep it. I'm currently trying to repair the sides, but the fountain itself is nice and the solar pump seems sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: MWild

customer_reviews.title: Solar Fountain Stops Working
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fountain since 2014. It has been in my garden the whole time. The base still looks brand new. But the bowl has seen much better days. Peeling paint and the material used for the bowl and tier (cement?) are deteriorating. The problem with this is the solar panel and battery itself. I have had to replace it at least 3 times. It never last more than 2 months then it quits. Don't buy this, its a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Love the item but it will start to deteriorate from ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the item but it will start to deteriorate from the harsh weather. Wish I would have put a sealant on it...maybe that would have protected it? Also should have stored it in the winter time unfortunately, with our wide swing of temperatures in a 24 hour period, I don't know if much of anything could survive at this price point. Otherwise, I love the look and the solar fountain and would consider staying with the solar element so I don't have to find an electrical source.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. Doesn't assemble properly. Substandard solar pump and fountain. Definite 100% buyers remorse due to shoddy quality. Save your $ for something more quality
customer_reviews.author: KolombianNecktie

customer_reviews.title: So far I’m loving it...
customer_reviews.text: I hope I’m not jinxing myself by writing this positive review but I’m really loving this fountain! I have other solar disc fountains but they won’t work at night or when it’s cloudy. But with this fountain I can go out in the early evening, sit in my swing, and enjoy a glass of wine as the sun is setting, all the while listening to the pleasant trickle of water. I especially like this feature when I have friends over. I just hope I don’t run into some of the problems others have written about...
customer_reviews.author: dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of it
customer_reviews.text: We've had this birdbath almost two years now. Love the look of it, but the solar fountain mechanism no longer works. I also like that it's heavy, but not too heavy when it needs cleaning. Wish it had been a little bit better made, but that's capitalism (and planned obsolescence) for you. We will probably need to replace it in a few years with something a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: annmmz

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fountain June 9th 2019. I loved it! I have received many comments and questions as to were I purchased it. I was working great until a couple of days ago when the pump seemed to quit. We found the instructions and tried all the troubleshooting recommendations, it still doesn't work. I know it is fully charged because is in full sun all day and my first thought was it wasn't charged to I turned it off for two days. This would have been a 5 star review if it had not died. I quickly called my brother to warn him, he was talking to me about purchasing the same fountain
customer_reviews.author: Deda

customer_reviews.title: Elegant fountain
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to assemble. The material is ok. We’ve had it for a month or so and since it’s solar on demand it runs on a battery. It needs full sun. If the sun hits it and and the dial is turned on the off position then no water will flow. You need to turn it off and on yourself. UPDATE!! I thought I would like solar on demand but I don’t. It only works 3 hours a day with full sun. Next time I’m getting an electric fountain. Solar sucks!
customer_reviews.author: FrenchC

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain exceeded my expectations, after reading the reviews. It was so easy to put together. Literally took 15 minutes to take out of box and assemble. No tools required. Fill with water and turn on. The instructions didn’t tell you how to turn it on but the circle and line on top of solar panel is on/off switch. It happens to be a cloudy day & water pump started to run, as soon as I turned it on. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service. Love my fountain.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m not giving this fountain 5 stars is because the original solar panel didn’t work. But I called the company’s customer service department. He was extremely helpful. He diagnosed the problem. Sent out a new solar panel that day along with a prepaid envelope for me to return the faulty one. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Weber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Detailed Solar Water Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Solar Water Fountain / Bird Bath Decorative little removal turtles on side of bowl. Detailed sculpting of leaves 🍁 attractive easy to use Finally able to get outdoors as cool temps not ideal for use must be stored indoors below 40 degrees!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works decent, but plastic is peeling within 2 months of usage.
customer_reviews.text: Product works well from a solar charging and use perspective. Was looking good when installed, but less than 2 months, there is peeling in the bowl and also peeling and stains in the top portion (with solar cell).. Contacted the manufacturer and they were going to send me replacement parts, but it's been nearly 2 months and they keep saying it's on back order. Not sure if I should get a replacement part that may also start peeling in a few months or just send this back and look for something better...
customer_reviews.author: Parth S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product material not as durable as i thought, cracks and chips are are in some areas. Little dissapointed..Amazon was great to refund me with prepaid return.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong fountain head
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked it to have been a bit taller and with a more powerful pump as the sound of water trickling isn't very loud. Live in Florida so solar system receives loads of sun. Like the shape. Birds haven't shown any interest but I do have a basic bird bath which they enjoy. Probably wouldn't have bought it if I had known the fountain part didn't spray higher and make more sound
customer_reviews.author: fussy

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed it while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fountain for the time we had it. Ordered in May 2019. It stopped working in April 2020. I live in central CA where there is no harsh weather. Unfortunately, the solar pump no longer works. I always cleaned the panel and the filter as well as keeping it full of fresh water. Miss the soothing sounds of a fountain but I can't find a replacement panel. I don't want to spend that amount of money again to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Smith

customer_reviews.title: So Easy Solar Fountain
customer_reviews.text: This fountain gives me joy everyday. To hear the flow of the water is so relaxing. It was so easy to put together. Once the solar panel was charged it was operational. The on-off switch is a great feature to have. The be st part is no electrical hookup is necessary! Beautiful and durable. So easy to use and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Good: - Look like real stone. I added a clear UV protection paint coat and it looks like new after 1 month in Phoenix sun. - Good battery. Took 30min to charge on the first use. After the sun goes down at 6pm, it continues to run till 11pm every day. - Birds love it. They come every 5 minutes to wash, drink, and poop. Bad: - Need to clean the pump every 3 days because it is clogged with bird poops.
customer_reviews.author: James.T

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box and it has huge cracks and chips in it! The crack at the bottom of makes it really flimsy. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fountain and loved it. Then one week after the return window closed, it completely died. I followed all of the troubleshooting suggestions-nothing. Emailed the manufacturer-nothing. Phoned the manufacturer-nothing. Also, the paint (or coating?) on the top tier has peeled off. So disappointed and furious at both Amazon and the manufacturer for their lack of concern and extremely poor quality. Update: Amazon customer service stepped up and has issued a postage paid return label for UPS and a full refund. While not satisfied at ALL with the fountain, I’m extremely satisfied Amazon is doing the right thing and was extremely kind about doing so.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: The fountain never really worked like in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The fountain never really worked like in the pictures. It would start out strong with a little stream of water then it just barely bubbled out. I cleaned the whole thing and made sure it was fully plugged in and in sun but could not fix it. It is in full sun but as soon as it gets into a little bit of shade it stops working. Love the idea of it and it is really pretty and solid material for outside.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Solar water pump works only for a very few hours
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I bought this fountain was that it had a solar-powered pump, My fountain is not in a shade at least for 8 hours a day but still the pump doesn't function the whole day, force of the water pump is really very very low they should have designed a better pump system even it means has a separate solar panel, I wouldn't have bought this product if I had come to know these data points.
customer_reviews.author: Sai Photography

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it is fully charged for 2 or 3 days bright sunshine
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have patience because it takes a couple of full sunshine charging....but then, we have a full-blown fountain working great. Even my tiny Hummingbirds are happily drinking and bathing. Will buy another one next year for a different corner of my garden.
customer_reviews.author: dutchoma

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, 😞 disappointed ,product crumbled
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for Daughter & Son in law for their birthday. They absolutely loved it. Set it on their deck next to gazebo and enjoyed it for one summer. It desnigrated after one season. Very disappointed with the fountain as it was expensive and a special BD gift. They both share the date and moved into a beautiful home. Was proud to display it and share with the birds & squirrels. Would appreciate a credit or refund. I would like to recommend a purchase to other customers but unable to do that at this time. Pics of previous post reflects what it looks like. Sincerely, Barbara M
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great little fountain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, cute little fountain. I put it together, and waited a couple of days to let the battery charge in the sun as per the instructions. Leveled and filled it today, and it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: MHall

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for about three days. The fountain never really worked, then it stopped completely. We waited a couple of days and then took it apart and put it back together. Nothing, so tried again, and again nothing. Of course, it quits working after the return date. Contacted the company directly for replacement pump and no response. Contacted company again, almost two weeks after the first time, and again, no response.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, aesthetic design.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is appealing to the eye, but not the best quality. After using it for a full summer, it has develop some sort of "cracks" which don't leak water, but moisture seeping through in streaks form a white "mold" on the underside of the bowl . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Judy Denver

customer_reviews.title: We have thoroughly enjoyed this little fountain
customer_reviews.text: We have thoroughly enjoyed this little fountain. It looks great and was not difficult to assemble. We love that it is solar powered and don't have to plug it in anywhere. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the fountain doesn't bubble out of the top very strongly. It glides down the sides beautifully and the water sounds lovely, but the picture indicated it would sort spurt out of the top, which it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda W

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: Fountain does not work well. .Water goes down where the solar panel fits,therefore not allowing enough water to fall over to the bottom level. Therefore you do not get the sound effects of a fountain with running water. Very Bad purchase !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sugar

customer_reviews.title: Ornamental not functioal
customer_reviews.text: Followed poorly written instructions but the fountain still doesn’t work after a weeks work of full charge under full sun. And under full sun, which is required to charge, the water turns boiling hot, enough to kill the bees and birds that go near it.

customer_reviews.title: Not for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: This was a great bird bath for the summer. However, it disintegrated as soon at it is got cold. I took the the fountain element out before it got cold. Also, I put a heating element in the base to keep water warm. It just cannot hold up to a South Dakota Fall/Winter. If you live where it freezes get a cement or composite bird bath.
customer_reviews.author: Bram Weidenaar

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fountain. Had it up and running in five minutes. I would have given it five stars but there are a few small chips in the upper bowl, I don't think anyone will notice, but I know they are there and one of the turtles was broken. Not going to request the fountain be replace just for these two small defects.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: One of best decisions and great addition to our garden.
customer_reviews.text: We've used this fountain Summer 2019, Summer 2020. It's wonderful. The birds love it. The squirrels come to drink from it. There's the comforting sound of the water, and the serene design. It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: StormyMarch

customer_reviews.title: Birds Not Attracted to it
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble and place in an area that gets full sun so it runs great. It sounds and looks beautiful but we have yet to see a single bird use it. We have bird feeders nearby and get many different birds, from quail to finches, to sparrows but none have perched on the feeder - we've had it a couple of months now. Perhaps because it is dark so the water is warmer? Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but poor quality pump
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at but the pump didn't last a month. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: LaurieT

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a seson
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy set up and was working good for the first two-three months. It was drained and properly stored for the 1st winter. See attached pictures, second summer this fountain did not work properly and start leaking. It is drained again and will be ready to end up in garbage container. Basically one season working item (4 months).
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz R

customer_reviews.title: This product was poorly shipped. The top to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was poorly shipped. The top to the fountain was in pieces inside box when opening. Having difficulty finding out how to have this shipped back to vendor. Box is too heavy for me to handle. Not able to take it to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: My kids got me this fountain for Mother's Day. it is pretty and looks nice in our flower bed. The solar power to keep the fountain going does not last nearly long enough though and it sits in direct sun for enough hours that it should easily have enough charge to last.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Love the look less than 10 min to set up
customer_reviews.author: William Annaruma

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up well.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this fountain when I got it but it cracked and the pump kept getting clogged.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Jenson

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only 3 months, very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I got this fountain only 3 months ago, it worked great until yesterday, it will not turn on, and there is plenty of sunshine, very unhappy with the performance as It was fairly expensive to only work for 3 months
customer_reviews.author: D2126

customer_reviews.title: Really like this fountain but can't quite get it level so ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this fountain but can't quite get it level so that it pours evenly off the 4 corners. Otherwise it looks and sounds nice.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: MY FEATHED FRIENDS LOVE IT!  SINGING HAPPIER TUNES!
customer_reviews.text: VERY satisfied. Birds now singing as they enjoy my thoughtfulliness. Only problem is much effort keep algae at bay. Maybe there's a chemical to add to water that won't harm birds. Don't use during cold winter months.
customer_reviews.author: "Edward Z" in Maryland!

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, but not a great battery system
customer_reviews.text: I expected the battery to work better. I suppose this one's better than one without a battery, but frankly even after charging all day in the bright sun, it doesn't run very long after the sun isn't shining directly on it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Owens

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this fountain for TWELVE DAYS and it’s stopped working. Ive attempted to contact the company many times. No response. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jbfdjrd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in our backyard!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased! Easy to assemble, easy to keep clean. Solar Battery holds a charge VERY well! The "On/Off" switch works just fine, but I don't really think it's a necessity. I would like to hear from others how their water flows and how high the fountain spouts. I'm not sure if ours does at the maximum. Seems like it should have a bit more force. In any case, very satisfied and the birds seem to enjoy it. :-) We like it so much, we bought another from the same company which we placed in our front yard.
customer_reviews.author: P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for long.
customer_reviews.text: The pump is no longer working, it is in the full sun all day. It really only worked well for about 4 weeks. It looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Holly W

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this fountain. For one thing the sections did not fit together well and pieces chipped easily. If I had kept the packaging I would have returned it. Now I use the base for a flower pot stand Nd the remainder I threw away. I ordered another type which I like very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Johns

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made, looks good and very easy to assemble. Although I just put it together I was surprised how way everything went together. Just need the sun to charge the solar panel.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Uphold

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain!
customer_reviews.text: Solar works as indicated. Didn't realize the solar was located on the fountain - thought there would be a panel that could be placed away from the fountain - my mistake. The location we choose works fine. The pump could probably use some additional filtration because it clogs a fair amount and requires cleaning - easy to get to but it impacts the flow from the top if it is clogged. I added some layers of filter before the pump to keep it flowing longer. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A Doby

customer_reviews.title: This fountain is beautiful!!! Lovely to look at, but...
customer_reviews.text: When we attempted to move the fountain to a space where we could see and hear it better, it came apart. The top began leaking and pulled totally away from the second layer. We tried to use water resist tape to rejoin the units, to no avail...water always finds a way, and leaks until empties. So sad! We love the beauty and design, but now it is useless and won't even hold still water let alone pump.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Langley

customer_reviews.title: We really enjoy this fountain
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this fountain. The only reason I give it four stars is that the "prongs" of the bowl were chipped off upon arrival. My husband fixed it with some sort of super glue, as we didn't want the hassle of sending it back. The solar charge lasts many hours, and the fountain has a delightful sound. It is so pretty in our flower bed - at night we have a solar spot light that shines on it. Our only issue is the quick build up of algae on these hot summer days. I did spray paint it with a clear coat before first use, as I'd read the other reviews with issues of surface water damage over time.
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was never happy with the water spray from the spout. It was very weak and it had plenty of sun to charge the solar panels. I lived with it last summer but decided to get a new solar spray to put in the fountain. When I lifted the second level of the fountain to put the new spray in, the basin literally disintegrated in my hands. This was not a cheap investment for me. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy - good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't plugged it in yet, the material its made from is strong and it will replace a plastic one I purchased in 2011 from Hayneedle. I had trouble finding the solar replacement so I purchased the fountain again. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: This is already not working. Can the seller please tell me how to get it to work or whether they will send me a replacement part. No water flows even in direct sun all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHERE ARE MY TURTLES????🐢🐢
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this item but it was pictured with 2 turtles and they were missing. There are two holes to mount the turtles that were NOT sent with my otherwise lovely birdbath. They were in the picture but not in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: 🐦 ⛲️ 🐦
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and easy to assemble. Runs while in direct sunlight, and after the sun goes down (though slower). I hope the birds like it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great unit but read caution....
customer_reviews.text: Loved this from the moment I got it... it is not cheap plastic but a solid decorative piece for your front or back yard. Be careful I had to replace the solar system due to my own mistake. The wires are always underwater and there are two plug in connections. Be sure you read the label on the cord carefully plug it ALL THE WAY IN. I didn't and it cost me to replace the unit. I did not ask for replacement nor grade them down for it was my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Thibodo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far love the product, birds use it daily, we will see how it holds up in weather, as others have said, item is more black than bronze but appears well made. certainly was well packaged
customer_reviews.author: walterco-sd

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and well made!
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath is really gorgeous and sturdy. The fountain hasn’t worked for us well, but I am sure it is because the solar panel gets too much shade. So far, the deer, birds, and squirrels all love it. :)
customer_reviews.author: trinity1412

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after only 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted the company and they sent me a whole new fountain in a week! Awesome customer service! After one year of use the fountain bowl developed hair line cracks where it attached to the base and now it will no longer hold water. I do not live in an area of extreme weather. I would have thought this would last longer than 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Doyle

customer_reviews.title: broken parts
customer_reviews.text: the turtles on the side of bath are broke . poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a buy!
customer_reviews.text: This works fabulously! The solar pump is strong. I have another plugin fountain that cost over $1000.00 (cement) and this sounds and looks amazing! Ordering 2 more - using this near our strawberry beds and fruit trees to deter birds from eating fruit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: looks like solid stone but is very light and very easy to assemble. if you have an are that doesn't have a lot of sun, you can charge the top in another location to charge and will give you a few hours of power. if i had the money i would buy 100 of these to put all over my yard. great value and just love it! only down-side is the connector at the top pannel is green.. but you can pain it black (or use a shrpie pen) to color it
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L. Randol

customer_reviews.title: Solar pump does not work
customer_reviews.text: We set up the birdbath and it worked for a few days and then stopped! The solar panel was in full sun but no longer works. It was a Mother's Day present so we are very disappointed to say the least. The birdbath is pretty and a good solid structure it's just the solar pump that isn't working
customer_reviews.author: C. Winston

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: i bought this in September 2015 and it is now cracking, leaking water, and the weathered finish is peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this fountain when I bought it in May. It was exactly what I wanted and looked great. It ran for 2 months and just quit working. We tried everything and it will not come back on.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure whether the material actually causes tiny leaks but it gets empty pretty quickly. Looks OK
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now. I live in Tucson, probably one of the sunniest regions in the world. The pump works only when there's direct sun, and it's quite unpredictable. If you can't get this to work here I doubt it'll work anywhere else. I'm not sure whether the material actually causes tiny leaks but it gets empty pretty quickly. Looks OK. Can move without too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: Love this fountain!!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain was not only easy to put together, but it works well and looks fantastic. Produces a great water sound too. I thought it may look cheap, but it doesn't. One weird thing is that there is a green connector piece that is on top of the solar panel on the upper bowl, and I don't know why they didn't make that black to hide against the black panel. But all in all I am extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: S. DesJardin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and sturdy and well worth thr cost.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bird bath. The sound of the running water is Lovely to hear on a hot sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Solar fountain does not always work
customer_reviews.text: Like all the other reviews indicated, the solar part only works occasionally. It doesn't work most of the time. Sad :(
customer_reviews.author: BC@MD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these fountains. The look nice but they do not last long. For the price these fountains should last longer than 1 year. Both have cracked so bad they are unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turning on and off
customer_reviews.text: It works great and looks very nice in the flower garden. Only thing I wish I would of thought of before buying is having a remote control. I have to turn it on and off manually. I like to listen to it outside our widow at night so I either have to let the battery die or go out to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Lee T

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fountain. I have it on my deck and birds, and butterflies love it too. Still trying to figure the settings out.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It is a great little fountain that adds a nice ambiance to our backyard garden area!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool bird bath.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and it looks great in our flower garden!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Butler

customer_reviews.title: Two years along, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Second full summer of use, very pleased. Looks nice, solar battery dependable so far, makes nice, soft white noise.
customer_reviews.author: ronc

customer_reviews.title: Item cracked within 6 months of buying .
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in June 2018 and the fountain part stopped working before end of summer and it cracked in December not even making it through a single Winter. Bad quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DeBo

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. The only reason I gave it one star ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a neat fountain. Works fine. The only reason I gave it one star is that in a few places the finish is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Sent to me after it was returned by another person. All labels for previous person were cut from box. With receipt had a happy fathers day message to previous buyer. The box was demolished with a ton of tape around the entire box. Product was of course damaged. Huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Product was well boxed, yet the fountain bowl was damaged upon arrival inside the box. The key that locks the fountain bowl into the base was broken. Clearly careless handling, but was shipped anyways as there were none of the broken off pieces inside the package. In addition, the base had paint chipped off. Otherwise, it's a good looking piece.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall design, but weak fountain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to complement my flower garden and as a watering spot for the birds. The construction seems pretty solid, and I had it assembled in under ten minutes. The solar power pump is ridiculously weak, and I'll likely look for either a stronger panel or a more efficient pump, or both. It was shipped box-in-a-box and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Qtr_Note

customer_reviews.title: I bought a second and are pleased.
customer_reviews.text: well made, Pump works well in bright sun. Battery operation questionable. Because of the small base I drilled 2 small holes and screwed to larger wood base. I bought a second and are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful addition to our deck...and the birds LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my favorite things purchased on Amazon. The birds LOVE bathing in it and drinking from it and it provides such nice ambiance to my deck. I love that it turns on automatically in the morning and turns off at night. Be sure to keep it clean for maximum efficiency. Love it!!! <3
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Get it! Works great for us!
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned given previous not so great reviews that this would not work well. Pleasantly surprised! Install no big deal, placed in sun for 1 hour at end of day and decided to turn on before recommended. Worked great! Nice addition to my flower garden. Only wished it came in other colors. Might try to spray paint in future but for now enjoying it in Bay Area CA
customer_reviews.author: J. Robison

customer_reviews.title: Great solar fountain!
customer_reviews.text: I love this solar fountain. It works great and was so easy to assemble. It is just what I had been looking for and I am so glad I purchased it. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
